DOC.brief_summary: To investigate relative bioavailability crush tablet suspend apple sauce water
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject Age : 18 45 year ( inclusive ) first screen examination Ethnicity : white Body mass index ( BMI ) : > 18 < 29.9 kg/m2 Incompletely cure preexisting disease assume absorption , distribution , metabolism , elimination , effect study drug normal History coronary artery disease Symptomatic postural hypotension ( e.g . dizziness , lightheadedness ) History bronchial asthma airway disease Smoking ( former smoker stop smoke least 3 month first study drug administration may include ) Clinically relevant finding ECG second thirddegree atrioventricular block , prolongation QRS complex 120 m QTc interval ( QT interval correct heart rate ) 450 ms Systolic blood pressure 100 145 mmHg Diastolic blood pressure 50 95 mmHg Heart rate 45 95 beat per minute
